text: The 2019 European Modern Pentathlon Championships will be held in Bath, Great Britain from 6 to 11 August 2019. The event will be the 27th edition of the competition, and the third edition held in Great Britain.https://www.teambath.com/sport/modern-pentathlon/2019-european- championships/ The event is a direct qualification event for the 2020 Summer Olympics, with the eight highest finishers in the men's and women's individual events gaining quota places for their National Olympic Committee at the 2020 Games. ==Medal summary== ===Men's events=== {| |- |Individual | Jamie Cooke | Valentin Prades | Martin Vlach |- | Team | Joe Choong Jamie Cooke Tom Toolis | Valentin Belaud Brice Loubet Valentin Prades | Jan Kuf Ondřej Polívka Martin Vlach |- | Relay | Myles Pillage Oliver Murray | Vladyslav Radvynskyi Andriy Fedechko | István Málits Richárd Bereczki |} ===Women's events=== {| |- |Individual | Laura Asadauskaitė | Kate French | Iryna Prasiantsova |- | Team | Kate French Joanna Muir Francesca Summers | Iryna Prasiantsova Anastasiya Prokopenko Volha Silkina | Laura Asadauskaitė Ieva Serapinaitė Gintarė Venčkauskaitė |- | Relay | Anastasia Petrova Ekaterina Khuraskina | Irene Prampolini Beatrice Mercuri | Luca Barta Kamilla Réti |} ===Mixed events=== {| |- |RelayMixed relay results | Myles Pillage Kerenza Bryson | David Kindl Eliška Přibylová | Valerio Grasselli Irene Prampolini |} ===Medal table=== ==Olympic Qualifiers== The following pentathletes secured qualification for the 2020 Olympic Games: {| class="wikitable" |- ! MenJoe Choong finished fourth, but having already qualified for Tokyo, his quota place was reallocated to ninth place finisher Patrick Dogue. !! WomenLaura Asadauskaite won the event, but having already secured qualification, her place was reallocated. Joanna Muir, Volha Silkina, Francesca Summers and Janine Kohlmann also finished sufficiently highly to qualify, but were discounted as only one quota place per nation was available for this event. |- | | |} ==References== ==External links== *Official website 2019 Category:2019 in modern pentathlon Category:2019 in British sport Modern pentathlon Category:August 2019 sports events in the United Kingdom Category:Modern pentathlon competitions in the United Kingdom Category:International sports competitions hosted by the University of Bath
title: 2019 European Modern Pentathlon Championships
